author: William Feuer
title: Global coronavirus cases cross 400,000, doubling in a week as pandemic accelerates
description: Confirmed COVID-19 cases topped 200,000 last week.
content:
COVID-19 cases surpassed 400,000 worldwide on Tuesday, doubling in less than a week as the virus spreads more rapidly across the world.
The total number of cases now stands at 407,485 as of 1:30 p.m. EDT on Tuesday, according to data compiled by John Hopkins… [+1413 chars]
